filter.description: Filter the apps by name or description. Looks for substrings.

kind.description: The kind of the component. Must be exactly 'ai-custom-chat-component'

builderDisplayName.description: The display name of the component in the component palette. Should be a short one or two word description of the component. For example: "Profile" or "Employees" or "Reorder"
